props

type string

type string
readonly True
desc an images unique identifier
family

desc an images family

families are logical groupings of images

desc the images tag

image tags are akin to versions
metadata
type object
props

type object

type string
desc a string to string key/value pair

schName v1stringmapentry

format datetime
desc the date that a workload image was created

the date an image was created
readonly True
nullable True
updatedat
type string
format datetime
desc the date that a workload image was last updated

the date an image was last updated
readonly True
nullable True
desc an images metadata
schName v1imagemetadata
desc
type string
desc an images description

this is optional and may not be more than 1000 characters
status
type string
enum
imagestatusunknown
pending
processing
ready
failed
default imagestatusunknown
desc which capture status an image is currently in

 imagestatusunknown the image status is unknown
  pending the image is pending creation
  processing the image is processing
  ready the image is ready
  failed the image failed to be created
schName v1imagestatus
imagesize
type string
desc an images archive size in bytes

this is only available on ready images
readonly True
volumesize
type string
desc an images volume size in bytes

this is only available on ready images
readonly True
deprecation
type object
props
deprecationdate
type string
format datetime
desc the date when an image is considered deprecated

deprecated images may be used in new virtual machine based workloads but are no longer considered for the default tag nor are they returned in image lists by default
obsoletiondate
type string
format datetime
desc the date when an image is considered obsolete

obsolete images may not be used in new virtual machine based workloads if an obsoletion date is present then the deprecation date must also be present with a same or earlier date
deletiondate
type string
format datetime
desc the date when an image is deleted

deletion dates cannot be before an images deprecation or obsoletion dates
desc an images deprecation settings
schName v1imagedeprecation
conditions
type array
items
type object
props
type
type string
desc type of the condition
status
type string
enum
imageconditionstatusunknown
true
false
default imageconditionstatusunknown
desc which status an image is currently in

 imageconditionstatusunknown the condition status is unknown
  true the condition is true
  false the condition is false
schName v1imageconditionstatus
checkedat
type string
format datetime
desc the last time the condition was checked
transitionedat
type string
format datetime
desc the last time the condition transitioned status
reason
type string
desc a stable identifier for the reason the condition is in its current state
message
type string
desc a human readable message with details regarding the condition
desc further information about an images status
schName v1imagecondition
readonly True
desc details about an images status
desc a virtual machine image
schName v1image
instancevolumesource
type object
props
workloadid
type string
desc the id or slug of the workload containing the instance to reference
instancename
type string
desc an instances name to reference a volume on
volumeclaimslug
type string
desc a reference to the volume to create an image from or unset for the root volume
desc a reference to the volume of an instance to capture an image from
schName v1imagesourceinstancevolume
title 
desc None
